segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Good morning everyone. Let's start our daily standup.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Good morning everyone. Let's start our daily standup.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Bob, would you like to kick us off with your update?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Bob, would you like to kick us off with your update?

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Sure. Yesterday I finished the API authentication module. Today I'll work on the database migration scripts. No blockers for me.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>Sure. Yesterday I finished the API authentication module. Today I'll work on the database migration scripts. No blockers for me.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Great progress on the auth module. Charlie, you're up next.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Great progress on the auth module. Charlie, you're up next.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: Yesterday I completed the login form UI. I'm waiting on Bob's API to test the integration. Today I need to implement the password reset flow.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>Yesterday I completed the login form UI. I'm waiting on Bob's API to test the integration. Today I need to implement the password reset flow.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: The authentication endpoints are ready. I'll send you the Swagger documentation after this meeting.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>The authentication endpoints are ready. I'll send you the Swagger documentation after this meeting.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: Perfect, that will unblock me. Thanks Bob.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>Perfect, that will unblock me. Thanks Bob.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Diana, how is the test planning going?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Diana, how is the test planning going?

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: I've drafted the test cases for the authentication flow. I need to review them with the team. Can we schedule a test case review session this week?
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>I've drafted the test cases for the authentication flow. I need to review them with the team. Can we schedule a test case review session this week?

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Good question. Let's go with Thursday afternoon for the review. Does that work for everyone?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Good question. Let's go with Thursday afternoon for the review. Does that work for everyone?

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Thursday works for me.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>Thursday works for me.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: I'm free Thursday afternoon.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>I'm free Thursday afternoon.

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: Perfect. I'll send out the calendar invite.
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>Perfect. I'll send out the calendar invite.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Before we wrap up, we need to discuss the deployment timeline. The stakeholders are asking about the release date.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Before we wrap up, we need to discuss the deployment timeline. The stakeholders are asking about the release date.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Based on current progress, I think we can have the backend ready by next Friday. The migration will need a weekend window though.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>Based on current progress, I think we can have the backend ready by next Friday. The migration will need a weekend window though.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: The frontend should be ready by Wednesday if the API integration goes smoothly today.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>The frontend should be ready by Wednesday if the API integration goes smoothly today.

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: I'll need at least three days for regression testing after integration. So if integration completes Wednesday, I can finish testing by Monday.
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>I'll need at least three days for regression testing after integration. So if integration completes Wednesday, I can finish testing by Monday.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: So we're looking at a Monday release. We decided to target Monday the 15th for production deployment.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>So we're looking at a Monday release. We decided to target Monday the 15th for production deployment.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Sounds good. I will prepare the rollback scripts as a safety measure. That's assigned to me for tomorrow.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>Sounds good. I will prepare the rollback scripts as a safety measure. That's assigned to me for tomorrow.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Excellent. Charlie, can you work with Diana to create a smoke test checklist for the deployment?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Excellent. Charlie, can you work with Diana to create a smoke test checklist for the deployment?

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: Will do. Diana, let's sync after this meeting.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>Will do. Diana, let's sync after this meeting.

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: Agreed. I'll block some time on our calendars.
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>Agreed. I'll block some time on our calendars.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: One more thing. How do we want to handle the feature flag for the new authentication? Should we do a gradual rollout?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>One more thing. How do we want to handle the feature flag for the new authentication? Should we do a gradual rollout?

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: I recommend a phased approach. We can start with internal users, then expand to 10% of production traffic.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>I recommend a phased approach. We can start with internal users, then expand to 10% of production traffic.

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: That aligns with our testing strategy. We agreed to use the phased rollout approach.
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>That aligns with our testing strategy. We agreed to use the phased rollout approach.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Perfect. I'll update the release plan document with these decisions.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Perfect. I'll update the release plan document with these decisions.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: Quick question - what about the legacy login endpoint? Are we deprecating it immediately?
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>Quick question - what about the legacy login endpoint? Are we deprecating it immediately?

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: We should keep it running in parallel for at least two weeks. I need to add deprecation warnings to the API response headers.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>We should keep it running in parallel for at least two weeks. I need to add deprecation warnings to the API response headers.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Good thinking. Add that to your task list, Bob.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Good thinking. Add that to your task list, Bob.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Already on it. I'll create the ticket after this meeting.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>Already on it. I'll create the ticket after this meeting.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Alright team, great discussion. Let's recap the action items.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Alright team, great discussion. Let's recap the action items.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Bob will send API documentation to Charlie, prepare rollback scripts, and add deprecation warnings to the legacy endpoint.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Bob will send API documentation to Charlie, prepare rollback scripts, and add deprecation warnings to the legacy endpoint.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Charlie will implement password reset and work with Diana on the smoke test checklist.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Charlie will implement password reset and work with Diana on the smoke test checklist.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Diana will send the test review invite for Thursday and complete the test case documentation.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Diana will send the test review invite for Thursday and complete the test case documentation.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: And I'll update the release plan with our decisions. Any questions?
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>And I'll update the release plan with our decisions. Any questions?

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: All clear from my side.
segments.raw_text: <v Bob>All clear from my side.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: Good to go.
segments.raw_text: <v Charlie>Good to go.

segments.speaker: Diana
segments.text: No questions here.
segments.raw_text: <v Diana>No questions here.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Great work everyone. Let's have a productive day. Meeting adjourned.
segments.raw_text: <v Alice>Great work everyone. Let's have a productive day. Meeting adjourned.
